vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.2.25;
son of: Jerahmeel (H3396);
brother of: Ram (H7410H), Bunah (H0946), Ozem (H0684H), Ahijah (H0281J) and Onam (H0208H)
§ Oren = "cedar"
a descendant of Judah
vocabInfos._es_Definition: (2)   hijo de Jerahmeel; tribu de Judá
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
阿連 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "香柏"
猶大的後代 (代上2:25)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
阿连 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "香柏"
犹大的后代 (代上2:25)
